mapper.delete: delete from hm_erp_venue_room where room_id = #{roomId} and company_id ={companyId}
mapper.insert: insert into hm_erp_venue_room (room_id, venue_id, room_name, room_level, room_type, priority, room_status, company_id) values (#{roomId}, #{venueId}, #{roomName}, #{roomLevel}, #{roomType}, #{priority}, #{roomStatus}, #{companyId})
mapper.select: select room_id, venue_id, room_name, room_level, room_type, priority, room_status, company_id from hm_erp_venue_room where room_id = #{roomId} and company_id ={companyId}
select room_id, venue_id, room_name, room_level, room_type, priority, room_status, company_id from hm_erp_venue_room where company_id ={companyId} and room_type = #{roomType}

SELECT concat(room.venue_id,"-",room.room_id) room_id, room.room_name, room.venue_id, venue.venue_name FROM hm_erp_venue_room room LEFT JOIN hm_erp_venue venue ON venue.id = room.venue_id AND venue.company_id = room.company_id WHERE room.room_type = #{type} AND room.venue_id in (${venueIds}) and room.company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hm_crm_dictionary (DICTYPE, DICCODE, DICNAME, PRIORITY, COMPANYID) SELECT #{roomLevelType}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(DICCODE), 0) + 1 FROM hm_crm_dictionary WHERE COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND DICTYPE = #{roomLevelType}), #{roomLevelName}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(PRIORITY), 0) + 1 FROM hm_crm_dictionary WHERE COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND DICTYPE = #{roomLevelType}), #{COMPANYID}

insert.foreach: insert into hm_erp_venue_room (room_id, venue_id, room_name, room_level, room_type, priority, room_status, company_id) values (#{item.roomId}, #{item.venueId}, #{item.roomName}, #{item.roomLevel}, #{item.roomType}, #{item.priority}, #{item.roomStatus}, #{item.companyId})
